title: Intentional feeder
body: Hi i was was streaming a ranked game when i got a few toxic players in my game our mid laner went nami and our jinx wasnt very happy about it so she int feeds i have the video is there a way i can report this to riot?

replies.body:
Good luck :D I hope they sort it out for you
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Yeap, you can report it [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure to include your video and a link to the game from your[ match history](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/OC1/201424942).

In the future try to remember to use the end-game report system though. Clear cut feeding cases like this are definitely detectable by the system  :)

> [{quoted}](name=Tele,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=8sY0dT7K,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-09T05:34:49.543+0000)
>
> Yeap, you can report it [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure to include your video and a link to the game from your[ match history](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/OC1/201424942).
> 
> In the future try to remember to use the end-game report system though. Clear cut feeding cases like this are definitely detectable by the system  :)

What should the request type be?

This is best category for when you're unsure:
[I have a question about League of Legends/Riot Games.] > [Game and Features] > [General Questions]

But they usually re-direct stuff to the correct place anyway, so it doesn't matter too much.
